Name: Fiery rage
Description: For each monster affected by Ignite, you earn {OtherValues[0]}% additionnal critical rate.
This effect can provide a maximum bonus of {OtherValues[1]}% additionnal critical rate.

Name: WindSpirit
Description: Each time the autoAttack hits an enemy, you have {OtherValues[0]}% chance to apply WindSpiritFavor in {OtherValues[1]} range's units.
This effect can provide a bonus of {OtherValues[2]}% for all cooldowns.
